Text: If she sells the property after 6 April 2020, the final period exemption only covers the last nine months, reducing the private residence relief to £42,000 (21/48 x £96,000).
Cause: If she sells the property after 6 April 2020
Effect: the final period exemption only covers the last nine months, reducing the private residence relief to £42,000 (21/48 x £96,000).
Sentence: <e1>If she sells the property after 6 April 2020</e1>, <e2>the final period exemption only covers the last nine months, reducing the private residence relief to £42,000 (21/48 x £96,000).</e2>
